activeIngredients.title: Active ingredients
activeIngredients.description: An array of active ingredients, typically chemical compounds or biological substances.

dosageForm.title: Dosage form
dosageForm.description: The dosage form in which the medicine is available, from the dosageForm codelist.

administrationRoute.title: Administration route
administrationRoute.description: The route by which the medicine can be administered, from the administrationRoute codelist.

container.title: Container
container.description: The container for the medicine. Also known as: presentation, presentation form, package.

ActiveIngredient.title: Active ingredient
ActiveIngredient.description: An active ingredient, typically a chemical compound or biological substance.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the active ingredient. It is recommended to use a generic name from the International Nonproprietary Names (INN). Also known as: generic name, drug, substance name, active substance.

dosage.title: Dosage
dosage.description: The dosage of the active ingredient. Also known as: concentration, potency.

Container.title: Container
Container.description: The container for the medicine. Also known as: presentation, presentation form, package.

name.title: Name
name.description: The common name of the container, from the container codelist.

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: The storage capacity of the container.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The weight, as a multiple of the unit of measurement. The weight is expressed in interval notation, for example: "[10,10]" for 10 units, "[1,10]" for 1 to 10 units, or "[10,INF[" for 10 or more units.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The codelist from which the identifier for the unit of measurement is taken, using the open [unitClassificationScheme](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#unit-classification-scheme) codelist. 'UNCEFACT' is recommended.

id.title: ID
id.description: The identifier for the unit of measurement, taken from the codelist referenced by the `scheme` field. Refer to the [unitClassificationScheme](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#unit-classification-scheme) codelist for details of how to find identifiers within schemes.
